snippet.title: Can you mitigate risk by replacing sensitive resources?
snippet.description: Risk assessment is about more than determining where you get your best security ROI. Sometimes, you need to examine the effects your resources have on your risk profile -- and get...

snippet.title: Stuff we've won
snippet.description: Well after reading about the first i-Pod draw, I thought it would be fun to discuss we've won, or perhaps NEARLY won. I've won a bunch of different stuff through dealers and draws...
